"The Build Palette":
"The Build Palette allows you to register a set of Build Commands and Build Parts for easy access in future.

While in the Build Menu, press <%Function> to begin registering a command or part.

While in Edit Mode use <%SubPaletteLeft><%SubPaletteRight> to scroll the cursor, and <%SubPalette> to select an option. When using keyboard controls, you can also access items on the Build Palette with the 1-0 keys."
